uk.co.optimisticpanda.gtest.dto
Class RuleUtils<D>

java.lang.Object
  uk.co.optimisticpanda.gtest.dto.RuleUtils<D>
Type Parameters:
D - The data type of the item that the rule is being made for.
public class RuleUtils<D>
extends java.lang.Object

A class that provides easy access to various built-in matches and edits. To preserve type safety, a RuleUtils will need to be created for each data type a rule is being made for.

Author:
Andy Lee

Parameters:
context - the context passed to the IPropertyAccessFactory
